name: Dragon Age: Inquisition - Jaws of Hakkon
name_original: Dragon Age: Inquisition - Jaws of Hakkon
description:
Dragon Age: Inquisition - Jaws of Hakkon is a RPG game developed by BioWare Edmonton. It came out on 24-03-2015. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Dragon Age: Inquisition - Jaws of Hakkon is available on PC, Xbox One, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
